001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004
005/**
006 * A low-quality continuous noise generator with strong artifacts, meant to be used as a building block.
007 * This bases its implementation on {@link ValueNoise}, and its static methods are still called
008 * {@link #valueNoise(int, double, double)}; this is almost entirely meant as an optimization for value noise.
009 * Instead of hashing all 2-to-the-D points, where D is the dimensionality, this hashes half of those points
010 * (like the square base of a pyramid) and interpolates that with one point in the center of the cube value
011 * noise would have used (like the cap or point of a pyramid).
012 * <br>
013 * Note: the {@link #valueNoise(int, double, double)} methods in this class return results in the range of 0.0 to 1.0,
014 * while the {@link #getNoise(double, double)} and {@link #getNoiseWithSeed(double, double, long)} methods use the Noise
015 * class default range of -1.0 to 1.0.
016 */
017@Beta
018public class PyrNoise implements Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D,
019        Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D {
020    public static final PyrNoise instance = new PyrNoise();
021
022    public int seed = 0xD1CEBEEF;
023    public PyrNoise() {
024    }
025
026    public PyrNoise(int seed) {
027        this.seed = seed;
028    }
029
030    public PyrNoise(long seed) {
031        this.seed = (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32);
032    }
033
034    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y)
035    {
036        final int STEPX = 0xD1B55;
037        final int STEPY = 0xABC99;
038        int xFloor = (x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1) & -2;
039        x -= xFloor;
040        x *= 0.5;
041        int yFloor = (y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1) & -2;
042        y -= yFloor;
043        y *= 0.5;
044        xFloor *= STEPX;
045        yFloor *= STEPY;
046        final int cap = hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, seed);
047        if(x == 0.5 && y == 0.5) return cap * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
048        double xd = x - 0.5;
049        double yd = y - 0.5;
050        double xa = Math.abs(xd);
051        double ya = Math.abs(yd);
052        if(xa < ya){
053            // flat base, cap points up or down
054            if(yd >= 0){
055                yFloor += STEPY << 1;
056            }
057//            x = (xd / ya + 1.0) * 0.5;
058//            x = 1.0 - x;
059            x += ya - 0.5;
060            ya += ya;
061            x /= ya;
062//            x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
063            ya *= ya * (3 - 2 * ya);
064//            ya = Math.sqrt(ya);
065
066//            ya = (ya - 0.5);
067//            ya = (ya * ya * ya + 0.125) * 4.0;
068
069//            ya = 0.5 - ya;
070//            ya *= ya * 4.0;
071//            ya = 1.0 - ya;
072//            if(x < 0 || x > 1)
073//                System.out.println("x is out of bounds in a horizontal-base pyr: " + x);
074//            if(ya < 0 || ya > 1)
075//                System.out.println("ya is out of bounds in a horizontal-base pyr: " + ya);
076
077            double cc = (1 - ya) * cap;
078            return ((1 - x) * (ya * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, seed) + cc)
079                    + x * (ya * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX + STEPX, yFloor, seed) + cc))
080                    * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
081//            return (ya * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX + STEPX, yFloor, seed))
082//                    + (1 - ya) * cap) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
083        }
084        else {
085            // vertical base, cap points left or right
086            if(xd >= 0){
087                xFloor += STEPX << 1;
088            }
089//            y = (yd / xa + 1.0) * 0.5;
090//            y = 1.0 - y;
091            y += xa - 0.5;
092            xa += xa;
093            y /= xa;
094//            y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
095            xa *= xa * (3 - 2 * xa);
096//            xa = Math.sqrt(xa);
097
098//            xa = (xa - 0.5);
099//            xa = (xa * xa * xa + 0.125) * 4.0;
100
101//            xa = 0.5 - xa;
102//            xa *= xa * 4.0;
103//            xa = 1.0 - xa;
104//            if(y < 0 || y > 1)
105//                System.out.println("y is out of bounds in a vertical-base pyr: " + y);
106//            if(xa < 0 || xa > 1)
107//                System.out.println("xa is out of bounds in a vertical-base pyr: " + xa);
108
109            double cc = (1 - xa) * cap;
110            return ((1 - y) * (xa * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, seed) + cc)
111                    + y * (xa * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY + STEPY, seed) + cc)) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
112//            return (xa * ((1 - y) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, seed) + y * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY + STEPY, seed))
113//                    + (1 - xa) * cap) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
114        }
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
119     * They should normally be used for the 3D version of R2, but we only use 2 of the 3 constants.
120     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xD1B55
121     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xABC99
122     * @param s state, any int
123     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
124     */
125    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, int s) {
126        s += x ^ y;
127        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
128    }
129
130    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z)
131    {
132        final int STEPX = 0xDB4F1;
133        final int STEPY = 0xBBE05;
134        final int STEPZ = 0xA0F2F;
135        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
136        x -= xFloor;
137        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
138        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
139        y -= yFloor;
140        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
141        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
142        z -= zFloor;
143        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
144        xFloor *= STEPX;
145        yFloor *= STEPY;
146        zFloor *= STEPZ;
147        return ((1 - z) *
148                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, seed))
149                        + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, seed)))
150                + z * 
151                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, seed))
152                        + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, seed)))
153                ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
158     * They should normally be used for the 4D version of R2, but we only use 3 of the 4 constants.
159     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xDB4F1
160     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xBBE05
161     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xA0F2F
162     * @param s state, any int
163     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
164     */
165    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, int s) {
166        s += x ^ y ^ z;
167        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
168    }
169
170    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w)
171    {
172        final int STEPX = 0xE19B1;
173        final int STEPY = 0xC6D1D;
174        final int STEPZ = 0xAF36D;
175        final int STEPW = 0x9A695;
176        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
177        x -= xFloor;
178        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
179        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
180        y -= yFloor;
181        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
182        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
183        z -= zFloor;
184        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
185        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
186        w -= wFloor;
187        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
188        xFloor *= STEPX;
189        yFloor *= STEPY;
190        zFloor *= STEPZ;
191        wFloor *= STEPW;
192        return ((1 - w) *
193                ((1 - z) *
194                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, seed))
195                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, seed)))
196                        + z *
197                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed))
198                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed))))
199                + (w *
200                ((1 - z) *
201                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed))
202                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed)))
203                        + z *
204                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed))
205                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed)))
206                ))) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
211     * They should normally be used for the 5D version of R2, but we only use 4 of the 5 constants.
212     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xE19B1
213     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xC6D1D
214     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xAF36D
215     * @param w should be premultiplied by 0x9A695
216     * @param s state, any int
217     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
218     */
219    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, int s) {
220        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w;
221        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
222    }
223
224    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w, double u)
225    {
226        final int STEPX = 0xE60E3;
227        final int STEPY = 0xCEBD7;
228        final int STEPZ = 0xB9C9B;
229        final int STEPW = 0xA6F57;
230        final int STEPU = 0x9609D;
231        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
232        x -= xFloor;
233        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
234        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
235        y -= yFloor;
236        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
237        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
238        z -= zFloor;
239        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
240        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
241        w -= wFloor;
242        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
243        int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
244        u -= uFloor;
245        u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
246        xFloor *= STEPX;
247        yFloor *= STEPY;
248        zFloor *= STEPZ;
249        wFloor *= STEPW;
250        uFloor *= STEPU;
251        return ((1 - u) *
252                        ((1 - w) *
253                                ((1 - z) *
254                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed))
255                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed)))
256                                        + z *
257                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed))
258                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed))))
259                                + (w *
260                                ((1 - z) *
261                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed))
262                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed)))
263                                        + z *
264                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed))
265                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed)))
266                                )))
267                        + (u *
268                        ((1 - w) *
269                                ((1 - z) *
270                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
271                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed)))
272                                        + z *
273                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
274                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed))))
275                                + (w *
276                                ((1 - z) *
277                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
278                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed)))
279                                        + z *
280                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
281                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed)))
282                                ))))
283        ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
284    }
285
286    /**
287     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
288     * They should normally be used for the 6D version of R2, but we only use 5 of the 6 constants.
289     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xE60E3
290     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xCEBD7
291     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xB9C9B
292     * @param w should be premultiplied by 0xA6F57
293     * @param u should be premultiplied by 0x9609D
294     * @param s state, any int
295     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
296     */
297    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, final int u, int s) {
298        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w ^ u;
299        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
300    }
301
302    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v)
303    {
304        final int STEPX = 0xE95E1;
305        final int STEPY = 0xD4BC7;
306        final int STEPZ = 0xC1EDB;
307        final int STEPW = 0xB0C8B;
308        final int STEPU = 0xA127B;
309        final int STEPV = 0x92E85;
310        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
311        x -= xFloor;
312        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
313        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
314        y -= yFloor;
315        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
316        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
317        z -= zFloor;
318        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
319        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
320        w -= wFloor;
321        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
322        int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
323        u -= uFloor;
324        u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
325        int vFloor = v >= 0 ? (int) v : (int) v - 1;
326        v -= vFloor;
327        v *= v * (3 - 2 * v);
328        xFloor *= STEPX;
329        yFloor *= STEPY;
330        zFloor *= STEPZ;
331        wFloor *= STEPW;
332        uFloor *= STEPU;
333        vFloor *= STEPV;
334        return ((1 - v) *
335                ((1 - u) *
336                        ((1 - w) *
337                                ((1 - z) *
338                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
339                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
340                                        + z *
341                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
342                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))))
343                                + (w *
344                                ((1 - z) *
345                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
346                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
347                                        + z *
348                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
349                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
350                                )))
351                        + (u *
352                        ((1 - w) *
353                                ((1 - z) *
354                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
355                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed)))
356                                        + z *
357                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
358                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))))
359                                + (w *
360                                ((1 - z) *
361                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
362                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed)))
363                                        + z *
364                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
365                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed)))
366                                )))))
367                + (v *
368                ((1 - u) *
369                        ((1 - w) *
370                                ((1 - z) *
371                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
372                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
373                                        + z *
374                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
375                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))))
376                                + (w *
377                                ((1 - z) *
378                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
379                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
380                                        + z *
381                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
382                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
383                                )))
384                        + (u *
385                        ((1 - w) *
386                                ((1 - z) *
387                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
388                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
389                                        + z *
390                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
391                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))))
392                                + (w *
393                                ((1 - z) *
394                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
395                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
396                                        + z *
397                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
398                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
399                                ))))))
400        ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
401    }
402
403    /**
404     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
405     * They should normally be used for the 7D version of R2, but we only use 6 of the 7 constants.
406     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xE95E1
407     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xD4BC7
408     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xC1EDB
409     * @param w should be premultiplied by 0xB0C8B
410     * @param u should be premultiplied by 0xA127B
411     * @param v should be premultiplied by 0x92E85
412     * @param s state, any int
413     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
414     */
415    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, final int u, final int v, int s) {
416        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w ^ u ^ v;
417        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
418    }
419
420    @Override
421    public double getNoise(double x, double y) {
422        return valueNoise(seed, x, y) * 2 - 1;
423    }
424    @Override
425    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, long seed) {
426        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y) * 2 - 1;
427    }
428    @Override
429    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
430        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z) * 2 - 1;
431    }
432    @Override
433    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
434        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z) * 2 - 1;
435    }
436    @Override
437    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w) {
438        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z, w) * 2 - 1;
439    }
440    @Override
441    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, long seed) {
442        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z, w) * 2 - 1;
443    }
444    @Override
445    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u) {
446        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z, w, u) * 2 - 1;
447    }
448    @Override
449    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, long seed) {
450        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z, w, u) * 2 - 1;
451    }
452    @Override
453    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v) {
454        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v) * 2 - 1;
455    }
456    @Override
457    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v, long seed) {
458        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z, w, u, v) * 2 - 1;
459    }
460}
